identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

block.p: * Joanne Davis, senior vice president of the Advertising Club of New York, was elected president, succeeding R. Jeffrey Petersen. Ms. Davis is a managing partner at Bozell Worldwide, a unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt, and Mr. Petersen is associate publisher of Architectural Digest, part of the Conde Nast Publications unit of Advance Publications. Steven Farella, senior vice president and director for North American media operations at D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, which is owned by MacManus Group, was elected senior vice president, succeeding Ms. Davis.

* Joanne Davis, senior vice president of the Advertising Club of New York, was elected president, succeeding R. Jeffrey Petersen. Ms. Davis is a managing partner at Bozell Worldwide, a unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt, and Mr. Petersen is associate publisher of Architectural Digest, part of the Conde Nast Publications unit of Advance Publications. Steven Farella, senior vice president and director for North American media operations at D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, which is owned by MacManus Group, was elected senior vice president, succeeding Ms. Davis.
